content: UFC 282Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 1 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1 point)b)  Predict how many Total Strikes Match 13 winner will score (if it's a draw, the highest of the two Total Strikes scored will be used)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-282-prochazka-vs-teixeira-2/matchesMatches13. Jan Blachowicz vs. Magomed Ankalaev 12. Paddy Pimblett vs. Jared Gordon11. Santiago Ponzinibbio vs. Alex Morono10. Darren Till vs. Dricus Du Plessis9. Bryce Mitchell vs. Ilia Topuria8. Jairzinho Rozenstruik vs. Chris Daukaus7. Raul Rosas Jr. vs. Jay Perrin6. Edmen Shahbazyan vs. Dalcha Lungiambula5. Chris Curtis vs. Joaquin Buckley4. Billy Quarantillo vs. Alexander Hernandez3. T.J. Brown vs. Erik Silva2. Vinicius Salvador vs. Daniel Da Silva1. Cameron Saaiman vs. Steven KoslowMatch 13 winner Total Strikes:Example13. Jan Blachowicz 12. Paddy Pimblett 11. Santiago Ponzinibbio 10. Darren Till 9. Bryce Mitchell 8. Jairzinho Rozenstruik7. Raul Rosas Jr. 6. Edmen Shahbazyan 5. Chris Curtis 4. Billy Quarantillo 3. T.J. Brown 2. Vinicius Salvador 1. Cameron Saaiman Match 13 winner Total Strikes: 65  (Small print)* Prizes will be prioritized based on overall general forum participation and activity *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **
